titleStmt.title: Bottom of a column from a roll of Iliad 10

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Implement changes requested by Sampson to both text and meta; in the text, change grave accents over last words in lines 2, 3, and 8 to acute (following West) and finalize.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Implement changes requested by Sampson to both text and meta; in the text, change grave accents over last words in lines 2, 3, and 8 to acute (following West) and finalize.

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Fine. In l.3 transpose square bracket before ἀσπάσιος one space to the right; l.6 > ἐπίσκοπον; As noted, the bottom margin is extant, therefore no lines lost after l.11. In metadata: Inv. # is 1601b (TM, on basis of ed.pr., erroneously lists it as 1601a). List acquisition info (i.e., in 1935, from Nahman, along with 1601a and 1602, which are also Homer--can links be added to those, whose TM numbers are 61162 and 60609?). Note for finalization: this is yale.apis.0016014200.

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Fine. In l.3 transpose square bracket before ἀσπάσιος one space to the right; l.6 > ἐπίσκοπον; As noted, the bottom margin is extant, therefore no lines lost after l.11. In metadata: Inv. # is 1601b (TM, on basis of ed.pr., erroneously lists it as 1601a). List acquisition info (i.e., in 1935, from Nahman, along with 1601a and 1602, which are also Homer--can links be added to those, whose TM numbers are 61162 and 60609?). Note for finalization: this is yale.apis.0016014200.
Submit - Entered text for P.Yale 2.92. The editor marks a high dot on line 41 after the ἀμβροσίην. It is unclear if this high dot is present.
